name: Bullet Boss
description:
This was my senior thesis project completed in 2016 as part of Miami University's Interactive Media Studies program. 

CONTROLS:

WASD/ARROWS - Movement

SPACE - Shoot

C - Deploy bomb

SHIFT - Focus

NOTE: Options (little red friends) are acquired by gathering power via powerups. When you are damaged, you lose one option. When you deploy a bomb, you spend one option. If you are damaged while you have no options, the game is over.
